arts.ttl: European football: Ronald Araújo edges Barcelona past Girona at the last
arts.sum: Substitute scores winner three minutes into added time Bayer Leverkusen’s unbeaten away run hits 37 at Mainz The substitute Ronald Araújo scored three minutes into added time as Barcelona secured a 2-1 win over a stubborn Girona in La Liga. Barcelona took the lead in the 13th minute, when Pedri received Lamine Yamal’s quick ball into the box and ran across the defensive line before dispatching a low left-footed finish. Yet Axel Witsel’s spectacular bicycle kick off Arnau Martínez’s header levelled for Girona seven minutes later. The hosts pushed hard for the winner with five shots on target in the first 30 minutes of the second half and their efforts were finally rewarded when the late substitute Araújo struck in added time. This story will be updated Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Araujo the hero as Barca break Girona hearts with last-gasp winner
arts.sum: Ronald Araujo scores a 93rd-minute winner as Barcelona record a 2-1 victory over Girona in Saturday afternoon's La Liga contest at Estadi Olimpic Lluis Companys.

arts.ttl: Barcelona beats Girona in stoppage time and Flick to miss clasico after sending off
arts.sum: Substitute Ronald Araújo snatched Barcelona a 2-1 victory over Girona in stoppage time in La Liga on Saturday and ended a mini losing streak before the clasico at Real Madrid next week. Pedri González gave Barcelona the lead with an exquisite goal in the 13th, sliding an angled ball back across the area and inside the near post without looking at the target.

arts.ttl: Returning Barcelona star talks about his fitness, Araujo’s winner after Barcelona 2-1 Girona – “I’m tired”
arts.sum: Fermin Lopez made his much-awaited comeback to the pitch against Girona by replacing Toni Fernandez at half-time. The Spaniard immediately added more zest and directness to the Barcelona attack and tried his best to get his team in front against a gritty Girona defence. arts.ttl: Pedri 9.0, Frenkie 8.5 | FC Barcelona 2-1 Girona: Player ratings
arts.sum: A shaky performance ends in victory for FC Barcelona. Despite being at home against a Girona side that has not been particularly impressive this season, this win took a lot out of the team. Ultimately, however, that 2-1 victory at home is one that the Catalan giants will celebrate. arts.ttl: Barcelona Player Ratings vs. Girona: Unlikely Hero Scores Stoppage Time Winner
arts.sum: Barcelona left it late to beat Catalan rivals Girona and move top of La Liga.

arts.ttl: Barcelona vs Girona: Summary and goals of the agonising Blaugrana victory
arts.sum: Pedri had opened the scoring and it was Witsel who equalised momentarily and Ronald Araujo gave his team the three points almost at the last minute. It was not until the end of the match, in the 90+3rd minute, when the much-criticized Araujo appeared and, playing as a forward, scored the winning goal.

arts.ttl: Hansi Flick’s bizarre selection decision pays off as one player’s new role secures win over Girona
arts.sum: A member of the defensive ranks at La Liga giants Barcelona was tested in a brand new role in the club’s latest outing. And it proved to be nothing short…

arts.ttl: Araujo 8, Pedri 8 | Barcelona 2-1 Girona: Player ratings
arts.sum: Barcelona and Girona took to the field in the season’s first Catalan derby on Saturday afternoon and the game was far closer than was expected. While Hansi Flick’s men were indeed coming off a two-defeat streak, Girona were seen as an opponent they could comfortably get past given their disastrous form this season. arts.ttl: Barcelona fans send Marcus Rashford message to Hansi Flick during Girona clash
